avalancheActivity.highlights: Not much snow at low elevations but isolated and small slabs could be present at the highest elevations.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Not much snow at lower elevations. Snowfall and blowing snow was over last weekend so isolated and small wind slabs could be present at the highest elevations.

travelAdvisory.comment: Some snow has melted widely at lower elevations but wind slabs could still be present at high elevations, especially in the Eastfjords and the north.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Little snow at lower elevations but wind slabs could still be present at high elevations.

weatherForecast.highlights: Næstu daga verður úrkomulaust og milt í veðri, með ríkjandi austanátt.

avalancheActivity.comment: An avalanche released in Litlahryggsgil above Flateyri on Nov 30.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs have formed in the mountains, especially on S-W aspects.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Small wind slabs have formed, especially on S-W-facing slopes. There is not much snow in the area in general, but snow is in gullies and lows.

travelAdvisory.comment: Some snow has melted widely at lower elevations but wind slabs could still be present at high elevations, especially in the Eastfjords and the north.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Little snow at lower elevations but wind slabs could still be present at high elevations.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hvassar A/NA-áttir næstu daga og dálítil snjókoma eða skafrenningur með köflum til fjalla. Hlýtt á láglendi

avalancheActivity.comment: An avalanche of size 2.5 fell above Karlsá near Dalvík the 4´th of December.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Significant snow melt has occurred in the lower elevations and snow has subsided. Some snow fall may occur in the next days.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Last week, there was moderate snowfall in the mountains, and small wind slabs formed in all aspects at higher elevations. Now snow has subsided and warmed up into the upper parts but some wind slabs may be present in upper parts.

travelAdvisory.comment: Some snow has melted widely at lower elevations but wind slabs could still be present at high elevations, especially in the Eastfjords and the north.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Little snow at lower elevations but wind slabs could still be present at high elevations.

weatherForecast.highlights: Ríkjandi austanátt og lítilsháttar snjókoma til fjalla næstu daga.

avalancheActivity.comment: Three avalanches released in Norðfjörður on Dec 5th. A few small avalanches released in Norðfjörður on Nov 29th.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow is in the area and wind slabs, which are unstable at first.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow is in the area and wind slabs which are likely unstable at first.  NE winds in the next few days with intermittent snow so more wind slab formation is expected, especially on SW/W aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: Some snow has melted widely at lower elevations but wind slabs could still be present at high elevations, especially in the Eastfjords and the north.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Little snow at lower elevations but wind slabs could still be present at high elevations.

weatherForecast.highlights: Áframhaldandi A-NA átt. Rigning á láglendi og neðri hluta hlíða en snjókomu hátt til fjalla.
